name: Kickblips: Chiptune High
description:
Be a student at a high school for chiptune

In "Chiptune High", you play as the first human to attend a unique high school for chiptune hardware and software. Here, students learn all about chiptune; chip history, advanced hardware modding, and the difference between a "beep" and a "boop".

Your attendance has been widely anticipated among the students, and likewise, you are excited to meet all the students! Get to know the students and discover chiptune platforms are more human than they seem.

3 different students to interact with

Talk to the ever-popular LSDJ, fellow new student Famicom Disk System, or the misunderstood Serum. Each one of them offers a different path and dialogue to explore!

24-track randomized soundtrack

From the 5th Kickblips cover album, the game features 24 chiptune covers of well-known anime tracks. Each playthrough will assign a random track to each character and location. Every playthrough will have a different feeling!

You can listen to the entire soundtrack on your favorite streaming site by going to kickblips.com

A collaborative effort

A small game made by nearly 30 people, 24 musicians, a different artist for every character, the background art, and UI, all using their own style! Mirroring the collaborative spirit that enabled the creation of the album the game is linked to.

Credits:
  • 3xBlast - Story, programming
  • Brickbrker - Background art
  • Chunderfins - LSDJ portrait art
  • Doefriends - Serum portrait art
  • DonutShoes - Sound design, producer
  • Twirlin' Curtis - FDS portrait art
  • vera, etc. - Logo & UI art
